activities.name: lk_tbl_aaa_customerorderdata
activities.description: incremenetally giving paremeters for etiketten number updation in Rako Label

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select Etikettennummer,MaterialNumber,PurchaseOrder,Item,CustomerNumber,StammNummer,PageCount,primary_filepath,secondary_filepath
from app.tbl_aaa_CustomerOrderData
where IsApproved = 1 and Isprocessed <> 1 and ApprovalTimestamp BETWEEN (
			SELECT last_modified_date
			FROM app.tbl_watermarktable
			WHERE table_name = 'app.tbl_Order_Creation_Inputs'
			) and '@{pipeline().parameters.pipeline_starttime}';
select @@rowcount

activities.name: lk_usp_spSorteCopy
activities.description: passing the new etiketten number to the sortencopy proc

activities.name: lk_tbl_sorten_etikettennummer
activities.description: finding the next etiketten number value

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select max(Etikettennummer) as Max_Etikettennummer,
	case 
		when RIGHT(cast(max(Etikettennummer) as int),2)= 99 
			THEN  
			0
		else cast(max(Etikettennummer) as int)+1 
		end as New_Etikettennummer
from dbo.sorten_aaa_bkp where stammnummer = @{item().StammNummer} and KundenNummer = left(@{item().StammNummer},4)

ifTrueActivities.name: lk_tbl_aaa_customerorderdata_etikettennummer
ifTrueActivities.description: updatingt he new etiketten and stamm in the customerorderdata table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
update app.tbl_aaa_CustomerOrderData
set New_Etikettennummer = '@{activity('lk_tbl_sorten').output.firstRow.New_Etikettennummer}',New_Stammnummer = '@{substring(string(activity('lk_tbl_sorten').output.firstRow.New_Etikettennummer),0,7)}'
where Etikettennummer = '@{item().Etikettennummer}' and 
MaterialNumber = '@{item().MaterialNumber}' and 
PurchaseOrder = '@{item().PurchaseOrder}' and
Item = '@{item().Item}' 
and CustomerNumber = '@{item().CustomerNumber}'
and PageCount = '@{item().PageCount}'
and primary_filepath = '@{item().primary_filepath}'
and secondary_filepath = '@{item().secondary_filepath}'
and Stammnummer = '@{item().StammNummer}'
select @@ROWCOUNT

activities.name: lk_tbl_sorten
activities.description: checking if the newly generated etiketten number is in the sorten table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select Etikettennummer as New_Etikettennummer from dbo.sorten_aaa_bkp where Etikettennummer = 
@{activity('lk_usp_spSorteCopy').output.firstRow.NewLabel}

activities.name: cp_Customer_Order_Input_table
activities.description: copy data to order creation input table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select distinct 3020 as Personalnummer,CustomerNumber as Kundennummer,cast(New_Stammnummer as int) as Stammnummer,
cast(New_Etikettennummer as int) as Etikettennummer,PurchaseOrder as Bestellnummer ,
cast(Qty as int) as Auflage,
DeliveryDate as Liefertermin,
UnitPriceCur as Bestellpreis,
Item as BestellnummerPosition
from app.tbl_aaa_CustomerOrderData where IsApproved = 1 and ApprovalTimestamp>
(select coalesce(last_modified_date,'1900-01-01 00:00:00') from app.tbl_watermarktable 
where table_name = 'app.tbl_Order_Creation_Inputs') and New_Etikettennummer is not null
